data.title: Tannishou wo Hiraku
data.title_japanese: 歎異抄をひらく
data.synopsis:
Yuien, a troubled young man, meets the Buddhist monk Shinran, and listens to his teachings. Shinran takes him on as his disciple, and they travel together, with experiences both joyous and heartbreaking awaiting them on the road.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: Shinmai Maou no Testament Departures: Maria no Hizou Eizou
新妹魔王の契約者 DEPARTURES 万理亜の秘蔵映像
The Testament of Sister New Devil Departures: Maria's Secret Video

data.title: Shinmai Maou no Testament Departures: Maria no Hizou Eizou
data.title_english: The Testament of Sister New Devil Departures: Maria's Secret Video
data.title_japanese: 新妹魔王の契約者 DEPARTURES 万理亜の秘蔵映像
data.synopsis: A special included on the Blu-ray/DVD volume. Super deformed versions of Mio and Maria narrate Basara's various erotic encounters.

titles.title: 俺、ツインテールになります。特別編

data.title: Ore, Twintail ni Narimasu. Recap
data.title_japanese: 俺、ツインテールになります。特別編
data.synopsis: A recap episode of Ore, Twintail ni Narimasu. that aired exclusively on BS-TBS. It starts with a chibi Souji and Aika speaking to the viewer before delving into the body of the recap where they comment about the events of the TV anime. The voice actors of Souji and Aika both represent themselves and the characters they voice flipping between sounding like their characters and speaking casually as real people. The recaps ends with chibi Souji and Aika thanking the viewer and then talking about how fun the Ore, Twintail ni Narimasu. live-event was (which clips are shown of) and asking viewers to visit the official site to find news about future events.

data.title: Gintama: The Final
data.title_japanese: 銀魂 THE FINAL
data.synopsis:
Two years have passed following the Tendoshuu's invasion of the O-Edo Central Terminal. Since then, the Yorozuya have gone their separate ways. Foreseeing Utsuro's return, Gintoki Sakata begins surveying Earth's ley lines for traces of the other man's Altana. After an encounter with the remnants of the Tendoshuu—who continue to press on in search of immortality—Gintoki returns to Edo.

Later, the regrouped Shinsengumi and Yorozuya begin an attack on the occupied Central Terminal. With the Altana harvested by the wreckage of the Tendoshuu's ship in danger of detonating, the Yorozuya and their allies fight their enemies while the safety of Edo—and the rest of the world—hangs in the balance. Fulfilling the wishes of their teacher, Shouyou Yoshida's former students unite and relive their pasts one final time in an attempt to save their futures.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: As of March 2021, Gintama: The Final has earned a franchise record of 1.85 billion yen (16.94 million USD) and debuted at No. 1 at the Japanese box office. The film concludes the Gintama anime series, adapting chapters 699-704 of the original manga with new story elements.

titles.title: Lupin the IIIrd: Mine Fujiko no Uso
LUPIN THE IIIRD 峰不二子の嘘
Lupin the Third: Fujiko Mine's Lie

data.title: Lupin the IIIrd: Mine Fujiko no Uso
data.title_english: Lupin the Third: Fujiko Mine's Lie
data.title_japanese: LUPIN THE IIIRD 峰不二子の嘘
data.synopsis:
Fujiko Mine is on the run with Gene, a boy who knows the location of a stash of $500 million dollars that his deceased father embezzled from the company Godfrey Mining. The boy is targeted by Bincam, an assassin hired by Godfrey Mining with a mysterious ability that allows him to bend a person’s will.

(Source: ANN)

titles.title: ポンタくんのおてがら

data.title: Ponta-kun no Otegara
data.title_japanese: ポンタくんのおてがら
data.synopsis: An educational children's anime about abduction awareness. A wolf kidnaps Mimiko the rabbit from a nearby park and Ponta the tanuki helps save her.

data.title: Spriggan (ONA)
data.title_japanese: スプリガン
data.synopsis:
Deep in the Ararat Mountains of Turkey, a secret organization known as ARCAM has found what is believed to be Noah's Ark. However, the U.S. Machine Corps., a rogue organization of the Pentagon, wants to take over the Ark as a means of global supremacy. Only a special ARCAM operative known as a Spriggan stands in their way. Japanese Spriggan Yu Ominae teams up with French Spriggan Jean-Jacques Mondo to combat members of the U.S. Machine Corps. led by Col. MacDougall—a genetically-enhanced boy with deadly psionic powers. However, they must act fast and stop MacDougall before he uses the Ark for his own agenda.

(Source: ANN)

data.title: Soba e
data.title_japanese: そばへ
data.synopsis:
The ad Soba e centers on a boy named Osamu who receives an umbrella as a gift from Sayu, but it goes missing. That umbrella transforms into a girl who goes gallivanting around town on a rainy day.

(Source: ANN)

data.title: Psycho-Pass 3
data.title_japanese: PSYCHO-PASS サイコパス 3
data.synopsis:
Thanks to the Sibyl System, the mental states of society can now be measured on a numerical scale. Using these "crime coefficients," a culprit can be apprehended before they ever commit a crime. But is it a perfect system? For Inspectors Kei Mikhail Ignatov and Arata Shindou, that remains to be seen, as their career with the Public Safety Bureau's Crime Investigation Department has only just begun. 

Shindou and Ignatov are assigned to investigate the crash of a ship carrying immigrants, but they begin to suspect that it was no mere accident. Meanwhile, a mysterious group called Bifrost is observing them from the shadows, but they are not the only ones who have taken an interest in the two new Inspectors.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

titles.title: The Girl From the Other Side: Siúil, a Rún

data.title: Totsukuni no Shoujo
data.title_english: The Girl From the Other Side: Siúil, a Rún
data.title_japanese: とつくにの少女
data.synopsis:
Let not an Outsider touch thee,
Lest thou shalt be cursed forever.

Once upon a time, in a land far away that was divided into two realms...
The Outside was roamed by teratomorphic creatures who had the power to curse whoever they touched. Humans could live safely only in the Inside. But when a lost little girl from the Inside named Shiva, and a demonic beast-looking Outsider simply known as "Teacher" initiate a quiet coexistence on the same side of the forest, their bond seems to transcend their incompatible natures. It is the beginning of a folktale about two outcasts -one human, one inhuman- who linger in the hazy twilight that separates night from day.

(Source: Production I.G)

titles.title: アソビルティザームービー

data.title: Asobuild Concept Video
data.title_japanese: アソビルティザームービー
data.synopsis: Web commercial to promote the grand opening of the entertainment and recreational facility "ASOBUILD." The building is made up of six floors, each with their own theme and unique attractions.
data.background: Qiezi Mabo's character from his song Qiezi Mabo Forever makes a couple appearances throughout the commercial.

titles.title: デンデン虫のデン子さん

data.title: Den Den Mushi no Danko-san
data.title_japanese: デンデン虫のデン子さん
data.synopsis: A music video as a part of the Minna no Uta series featuring a song by Duke Aces.
data.background: The winner song of 1973 NHK "Minna no Melody."

data.title: Crystal Sea Ver. 69 (Kay Nakayama Remix)
data.title_japanese: Crystal Sea Ver.69 [Kay Nakayama Remix]
data.synopsis: Music video directed by Mitsuyuki Ishibashi for Crystal Sea Ver. 69 by Intelligent Jazz, a collaborative project formed by Kay Nakayama with drummer Akira Jimbo.

カミナリ坊やピカッ太君の交通安全

data.title: Kaminari Boy Pikatta-kun no Koutsuu Anzen
data.title_japanese: カミナリ坊やピカッ太君の交通安全
data.synopsis: A traffic safety anime starring the cast of Kaminari Boy Pikkari★bee.

titles.title: Kaminari Boy Pikatta-kun no Jitensha Kyoushitsu
カミナリ坊やピカッ太君の自転車教室

data.title: Kaminari Boy Pikatta-kun no Jitensha Kyoushitsu
data.title_japanese: カミナリ坊やピカッ太君の自転車教室
data.synopsis: A bicycle safety anime starring the cast of Kaminari Boy Pikkari★bee.

titles.title: とびだすな！ パンダちゃん

data.title: Tobidasu na! Panda-chan
data.title_japanese: とびだすな！ パンダちゃん
data.synopsis: A traffic safety anime by Toei for kindergartners and lower level elementary schoolers. An anthropomorphic Panda is taught traffic rules by children the same as the target audience. So as to let the children feel in control rather than being the ones always spoken down to.

titles.title: Doctor X no Jitensha Anzen Seminar
ドクターＸの自転車安全セミナー

data.title: Doctor X no Jitensha Anzen Seminar
data.title_japanese: ドクターＸの自転車安全セミナー
data.synopsis: Satoru, Akira and Ichiro are riding bicycles, weaving between people walking when they nearly collide with a car at an intersection.  They are saved by Doctor X who sends them a letter with alternative future photographs. They are pictures of the accident, showing the outcome of their lives had he not been there.

titles.title: Doubutsu Mura no World Cup: Yoiko no Koutsuu Anzen
どうぶつ村のワールドカップ〜よい子のこうつうあんぜん〜

data.title: Doubutsu Mura no World Cup: Yoiko no Koutsuu Anzen
data.title_japanese: どうぶつ村のワールドカップ〜よい子のこうつうあんぜん〜
data.synopsis: A children's traffic safety anime with a soccer theme in honor of the 2002 World Cup which was hosted in Japan and South Korea. Many children want to play the sport but it's easy for them to get into accidents chasing after balls in the street.

titles.title: ファンタシースターオンライン2 エピソード・オラクル

data.title: Phantasy Star Online 2: Episode Oracle
data.title_japanese: ファンタシースターオンライン2 エピソード・オラクル
data.synopsis:
A TV anime adaptation of episode 1-3 out of 5 the total episodes from the Phantasy Star Online 2 game. Some anime-original content will be created as well.

Episode 1: During their qualification exam in planet Naberius, the player and fellow ARKS trainee Afin were attacked by vile organisms known as Darkers. This is followed by the two discovering a mysterious girl who lost most of her memories, and the truth regarding Naberius and the recent spike of Darker activities. 

Episode 2: The plot follows the player and Matoi as they try to unravel a dark conspiracy regarding the origin and purpose of ARKS.

Episode 3: The discovery of the planet Harukotan brought a new quest into the fray, as the peace between the Shironian and Kuronites that dwell in the planet is disturbed by the Kuronites' sudden attack. The newly-reformed ARKS is tasked to investigate the reason behind it all, and it seems like the truth is more complicated and horrifying than expected... 

(Source: phantasystar.fandom.com)

titles.title: Sonotoki Kimi wa?: Ryouta to Pikari no Jishin Bousai Gaku
その時君は？ －良太とピカリの地震防災学－

data.title: Sonotoki Kimi wa?: Ryouta to Pikari no Jishin Bousai Gaku
data.title_japanese: その時君は？ －良太とピカリの地震防災学－
data.synopsis: An elementary school boy experiences an big earthquake. He's experienced earthquakes before but not one of this scale. It did some extensive damage and he decides to learn about earthquake recovery. How things are done and why things are done in specific orders.

data.title: Main Actor
data.title_japanese: main actor
data.synopsis: Music video for the song main actor by Minami.

data.title: Tenuto
data.title_japanese: テヌート
data.synopsis: Music video directed by Kousuke Sugimoto for the song Tenuto by Handsome Kenya on the mini album "Black Frame." The album had two releases, one which included a bonus DVD featuring this music video and a short documentary about Handsome Kenya. The music video was posted on YouTube along with a preview of the documentary in a single video. This entry only accounts for the runtime of the music video.

Gin-iro no Kami no Agito Pilot

data.title: Kesshin Sokudo
data.title_japanese: 決心速度
data.synopsis: Music video directed by Kousuke Sugimoto for the song Kesshin Sokudo by Handsome Kenya. It features a blend of live-action and animation.

titles.title: ヴァンパイア・イン・ザ・ガーデン

data.title: Vampire in the Garden
data.title_japanese: ヴァンパイア・イン・ザ・ガーデン
data.synopsis:
During a winter long ago, near-immortal vampires began plaguing the world. As their population grew at an astounding rate, they promptly threw humanity off its place at the top of the food chain. Desperate to avoid extinction, the surviving humans concentrated in their last safe haven—a small city surrounded by an enormous wall. There, they have waged war against the vampires for many years. 

In the midst of a particularly brutal attack by the vampires, a human soldier named Momo encounters Fiine, the queen of their enemies. After seeing her try to save Momo's best friend from a rampaging vampire, Momo follows Fiine back to her house. It is there Momo connects with Fiine over their love for music and desire to escape the fighting. 

Pursuing that goal of escape, the two decide to journey toward a supposed paradise where humans and vampires coexist—despite being uncertain of its existence. However, Momo and Fiine are being targeted by both races, who they must first evade if they hope to reach their destination in one piece.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Vampire in the Garden was slated for a worldwide release on Netflix in 2021, but it was delayed until 2022 due to pandemic-related issues.
